item.title: FBI veteran alleges he was fired for displaying Pride flag
item.description: A 16-year FBI employee has filed a lawsuit alleging he was fired last month because he had a Pride flag displayed near his desk.

item.title: Will life insurance be worth it for seniors in 2026?
item.description: The right life insurance policy (at the right price) could be valuable for seniors in 2026. Here's why.

item.title: What happens to California's redistricting after Texas' maps were struck down?
item.description: The court ruling came after California voters formally approved a ballot measure that was introduced to counteract Texas' redistricting.

item.title: 5 charts that illustrate America's deepening affordability crisis
item.description: Although inflation has eased, many Americans say they still feel squeezed financially. Here are five areas where households are feeling the pinch.
